emigrate.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to leave your own country in order to live in another country
emigrate.translation[0].definitions[0].e: He emigrated to Australia as a young man.
emigrate.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to leave your own country to live permanently in another country
emigrate.translation[1].definitions[0].e: About 8000 people emigrate from the region each year.
